name: BHVNederland
tag_list: bhv-nederland, bhv-cursus, bhv-examen, bhv-training, bhv, aed, bedrijfshulpverlening, bhv-certificaat, ontruimingsplattegrond, reanimatie, algemeen, internet, general, nederlands, dutch, commercial, website, opleidingen, education, cursus, examen, exam, s
overview:
BHVNederland is a Dutch company which specializes in offering Emergency Response Officer (ERO) courses including first aid, occupational health and safety, ERO training on location and ERO In Company training.

BHV course are organized on several locations throughout the Netherlands. A BHV certificate is valid for one year. When a certificate expires the license can be extended by attending the Emergency Response Officer refresher course.

ERO stands for Emergency Response Officer. An Emergency Response Officer is an qualified employee trained to respond according to safety guidelines in emergency situations. Every company in the Netherlands is required to organize Emergency Services to protect employees as well as visitors from injury and serious hazard in case of danger. People become an Emergency Response Officer when succesfully completing the BHV courses provided by BHVNederland.

In the BHV course Emergency Response Officers are trained to:

* provide first aid
* fight fires
* practice CPR in case of heart failure
* escort colleagues and visitors to safety
